config.name: dampingFactor
config.description: The damping factor of the Page Rank calculation. Must be in [0, 1).

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations of Article Rank to run.

config.name: tolerance
config.description: Minimum change in scores between iterations. If all scores change less than the tolerance value the result is considered stable, and the algorithm returns.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: sourceNodes
config.description: The nodes or node ids to use for computing Personalized Page Rank.

config.name: scaler
config.description: The name of the scaler applied for the final scores. Supported values are `None`, `MinMax`, `Max`, `Mean`, `Log`, and `StdScore`.  To apply scaler-specific configuration, use the Map syntax: `{scaler: 'name', ...}`.

config.name: samplingSize
config.description: The number of source nodes to consider for computing centrality scores.

config.name: samplingSeed
config.description: The seed value for the random number generator that selects start nodes.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: seedSetSize
config.description: The number of nodes that maximize the expected spread in the network.

config.name: monteCarloSimulations
config.description: The number of Monte-Carlo simulations.

config.name: propagationProbability
config.description: The probability of a node being activated by an active neighbour node.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description: The seed value to control the randomness of the algorithm.

config.name: useWassermanFaust
config.description: Use the improved Wasserman-Faust formula for closeness computation.

config.name: orientation
config.description: The orientation used to compute node degrees. Supported orientations are `NATURAL`, `REVERSE` and `UNDIRECTED`.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use for weighted degree computation. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations of Eigenvector Centrality to run.

config.name: tolerance
config.description: Minimum change in scores between iterations. If all scores change less than the tolerance value the result is considered stable and the algorithm returns.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: sourceNodes
config.description: The nodes or node ids to use for computing Personalized Page Rank.

config.name: scaler
config.description: The name of the scaler applied for the final scores. Supported values are `None`, `MinMax`, `Max`, `Mean`, `Log`, and `StdScore`.  To apply scaler-specific configuration, use the Map syntax: `{scaler: 'name', ...}`.

config.name: dampingFactor
config.description: The damping factor of the Page Rank calculation. Must be in [0, 1).

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations of Page Rank to run.

config.name: tolerance
config.description: Minimum change in scores between iterations. If all scores change less than the tolerance value the result is considered stable and the algorithm returns.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: sourceNodes
config.description: The nodes or node ids to use for computing Personalized Page Rank.

config.name: scaler
config.description: The name of the scaler applied for the final scores. Supported values are `None`, `MinMax`, `Max`, `Mean`, `Log`, and `StdScore`.  To apply scaler-specific configuration, use the Map syntax: `{scaler: 'name', ...}`.

config.name: hitsIterations
config.description: The number of hits iterations to run. The number of pregel iterations will be equal to hitsIterations * 4

config.name: authProperty
config.description: The name that is used for the auth property when using STREAM, MUTATE or WRITE modes.

config.name: hubProperty
config.description: The name that is used for the hub property when using STREAM, MUTATE or WRITE modes.

config.name: partitioning
config.description: The partitioning scheme used to divide the work between threads. Available options are AUTO, RANGE, DEGREE.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: communityProperty
config.description: The node property that holds the community ID as an integer for each node. Note that only non-negative community IDs are considered valid and will have their conductance computed.

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations of K1 Coloring to run.

config.name: minCommunitySize
config.description: Only nodes inside communities larger or equal the given value are returned.

config.name: nodeProperty
config.description: A node property corresponding to an array of floats used by K-Means to cluster nodes into communities.

config.name: k
config.description: Number of desired clusters.

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations of K-Means to run.

config.name: deltaThreshold
config.description: Value as a percentage to determine when to stop early. If fewer  than 'deltaThreshold * |nodes|'  nodes change their cluster , the algorithm stops. Value must be between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive).

config.name: numberOfRestarts
config.description: Number of times to execute K-Means with different initial centers. The communities returned are those minimizing the average node-center distances.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description: The seed value to control the initial centroid assignment.

config.name: initialSampler
config.description: The method used to sample the first k centroids. "uniform" and "kmeans++", both case-insensitive, are valid inputs.

config.name: seedCentroids
config.description: Parameter to explicitly give the initial centroids. It cannot be enabled together with a non-default value of the numberOfRestarts parameter.

config.name: computeSilhouette
config.description: If set to true,  the silhouette scores are computed once the clustering has been determined. Silhouette is a metric on how well the nodes have been clustered.

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations to run.

config.name: nodeWeightProperty
config.description: The name of a node property that contains node weights.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: seedProperty
config.description: The name of a node property that defines an initial numeric label.

config.name: consecutiveIds
config.description: Flag to decide whether component identifiers are mapped into a consecutive id space (requires additional memory).

config.name: minCommunitySize
config.description: Only nodes inside communities larger or equal the given value are returned.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: maxLevels
config.description: The maximum number of levels in which the graph is clustered and then condensed.

config.name: gamma
config.description: Resolution parameter used when computing the modularity. Internally the value is divided by the number of relationships for an unweighted graph, or the sum of weights of all relationships otherwise. [1]

config.name: theta
config.description: Controls the randomness while breaking a community into smaller ones.

config.name: tolerance
config.description: Minimum change in modularity between iterations. If the modularity changes less than the tolerance value, the result is considered stable and the algorithm returns.

config.name: includeIntermediateCommunities
config.description: Indicates whether to write intermediate communities. If set to false, only the final community is persisted.

config.name: seedProperty
config.description: Used to set the initial community for a node. The property value needs to be a non-negative number.

config.name: minCommunitySize
config.description: Only nodes inside communities larger or equal the given value are returned.

config.name: triangleCountProperty
config.description: Node property that contains pre-computed triangle count.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: seedProperty
config.description: Used to set the initial community for a node. The property value needs to be a non-negative number.

config.name: maxLevels
config.description: The maximum number of levels in which the graph is clustered and then condensed.

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations that the modularity optimization will run for each level.

config.name: tolerance
config.description: Minimum change in modularity between iterations. If the modularity changes less than the tolerance value, the result is considered stable and the algorithm returns.

config.name: includeIntermediateCommunities
config.description: Indicates whether to write intermediate communities. If set to false, only the final community is persisted.

config.name: consecutiveIds
config.description: Flag to decide whether component identifiers are mapped into a consecutive id space (requires additional memory). Cannot be used in combination with the includeIntermediateCommunities flag.

config.name: minCommunitySize
config.description: Only nodes inside communities larger or equal the given value are returned.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: communityProperty
config.description: The node property that holds the community ID as an integer for each node. Note that only non-negative community IDs are considered valid and will have their modularity score computed.

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: The maximum number of iterations to run.

config.name: tolerance
config.description: Minimum change in modularity between iterations. If the modularity changes less than the tolerance value, the result is considered stable and the algorithm returns.

config.name: seedProperty
config.description: Used to define initial set of labels (must be a non-negative number).

config.name: consecutiveIds
config.description: Flag to decide whether component identifiers are mapped into a consecutive id space (requires additional memory).

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: minCommunitySize
config.description: Only nodes inside communities larger or equal the given value are returned.

config.name: consecutiveIds
config.description: Flag to decide whether component identifiers are mapped into a consecutive id space (requires additional memory).

config.name: maxDegree
config.description: If a node has a degree higher than this it will not be considered by the algorithm. The triangle count for these nodes will be `-1`.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: seedProperty
config.description: Used to set the initial component for a node. The property value needs to be a number.

config.name: threshold
config.description: The value of the weight above which the relationship is considered in the computation.

config.name: consecutiveIds
config.description: Flag to decide whether component identifiers are mapped into a consecutive id space (requires additional memory).

config.name: minComponentSize
config.description: Only nodes inside communities larger or equal the given value are returned.

config.name: k
config.description: The number of disjoint communities the nodes will be divided into.

config.name: iterations
config.description: The number of iterations the algorithm will run before returning the best solution among all the iterations.

config.name: vnsMaxNeighborhoodOrder
config.description: The maximum number of nodes VNS will swap when perturbing solutions.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description: A random seed which is used for all randomness in the computation. Requires concurrency = 1.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: If set, the values stored at the given property are used as relationship weights during the computation. If not set, the graph is considered unweighted.

config.name: minCommunitySize
config.description: Only nodes inside communities larger or equal the given value are returned.

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: Maximum number of iterations to run.

config.name: minAssociationStrength
config.description: Minimum influence required for a community to retain a node.

config.name: partitioning
config.description: The partitioning scheme used to divide the work between threads. Available options are AUTO, RANGE, DEGREE.

config.name: similarityCutoff
config.description:
Lower limit for the similarity score to be present in the result.
Values must be between 0 and 1.

config.name: degreeCutoff
config.description:
Inclusive lower bound on the node degree for a node to be considered in the comparisons.
This value can not be lower than 1.

config.name: upperDegreeCutoff
config.description:
Inclusive upper bound on the node degree for a node to be considered in the comparisons.
This value can not be lower than 1.

config.name: topK
config.description:
Limit on the number of scores per node.
The K largest results are returned.
This value cannot be lower than 1.

config.name: bottomK
config.description:
Limit on the number of scores per node.
The K smallest results are returned.
This value cannot be lower than 1.

config.name: topN
config.description:
Global limit on the number of scores computed.
The N largest total results are returned.
This value cannot be negative, a value of 0 means no global limit.

config.name: bottomN
config.description:
Global limit on the number of scores computed.
The N smallest total results are returned.
This value cannot be negative, a value of 0 means no global limit.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description:
Name of the relationship property to use as weights.
If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: similarityMetric
config.description:
The metric used to compute similarity.
Can be either `JACCARD`, `OVERLAP` or `COSINE`.

config.name: useComponents
config.description:
If enabled, Node Similarity will use components to improve the performance of the computation, skipping comparisons of nodes in different components.
Set to `false` (Default): the algorithm does not use components, but computes similarity across the entire graph.
Set to `true`: the algorithm uses components, and will compute these components before computing similarity.
Set to *String*: use pre-computed components stored in the graph, with String as the key for a node property representing components

config.name: similarityCutoff
config.description:
Lower limit for the similarity score to be present in the result.
Values must be between 0 and 1.

config.name: degreeCutoff
config.description:
Inclusive lower bound on the node degree for a node to be considered in the comparisons.
This value can not be lower than 1.

config.name: upperDegreeCutoff
config.description:
Inclusive upper bound on the node degree for a node to be considered in the comparisons.
This value can not be lower than 1.

config.name: topK
config.description:
Limit on the number of scores per node.
The K largest results are returned.
This value cannot be lower than 1.

config.name: bottomK
config.description:
Limit on the number of scores per node.
The K smallest results are returned.
This value cannot be lower than 1.

config.name: topN
config.description:
Global limit on the number of scores computed.
The N largest total results are returned.
This value cannot be negative, a value of 0 means no global limit.

config.name: bottomN
config.description:
Global limit on the number of scores computed.
The N smallest total results are returned.
This value cannot be negative, a value of 0 means no global limit.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description:
Name of the relationship property to use as weights.
If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: similarityMetric
config.description:
The metric used to compute similarity.
Can be either JACCARD, OVERLAP or COSINE.

config.name: useComponents
config.description:
If enabled, Node Similarity will use components to improve the performance of the computation, skipping comparisons of nodes in different components.
Set to false (Default): the algorithm does not use components, but computes similarity across the entire graph.
Set to true: the algorithm uses components, and will compute these components before computing similarity.
Set to String: use pre-computed components stored in the graph, with String as the key for a node property representing components

config.name: sourceNodeFilter
config.type: Integer or List of Integer or String
config.description:
The source node filter to apply.
Accepts a single node id,
a List of node ids,
or a single label.

config.name: targetNodeFilter
config.type: Integer or List of Integer or String
config.description:
The target node filter to apply.
Accepts a single node id,
a List of node ids,
or a single label.

config.name: nodeProperties
config.type: String or Map or List of Strings / Maps
config.description:
The node properties to use for similarity computation along with their selected similarity metrics.
Accepts a single property key,
a Map of property keys to metrics,
or a List of property keys and/or Maps, as above.
See Node properties and metrics configuration for details.

config.name: topK
config.description:
The number of neighbors to find for each node.
The K-nearest neighbors are returned.
This value cannot be lower than 1.

config.name: sampleRate
config.description:
Sample rate to limit the number of comparisons per node.
Value must be between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive).

config.name: deltaThreshold
config.description:
Value as a percentage to determine when to stop early.
If fewer updates than the configured value happen, the algorithm stops.
Value must be between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive).

config.name: maxIterations
config.description: Hard limit to stop the algorithm after that many iterations.

config.name: randomJoins
config.description: The number of random attempts per node to connect new node neighbors based on random selection, for each iteration.

config.name: initialSampler
config.description: The method used to sample the first k random neighbors for each node. "uniform" and "randomWalk", both case-insensitive, are valid inputs.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description:
The seed value to control the randomness of the algorithm.
Note that concurrency must be set to 1 when setting this parameter.

config.name: similarityCutoff
config.description: Filter out from the list of K-nearest neighbors nodes with similarity below this threshold.

config.name: perturbationRate
config.description: The probability of replacing the least similar known neighbor with an encountered neighbor of equal similarity.

config.name: nodeProperties
config.type: String or Map or List of Strings / Maps
config.description:
The node properties to use for similarity computation along with their selected similarity metrics.
Accepts a single property key,
a Map of property keys to metrics,
or a List of property keys and/or Maps, as above.
See Node properties and metrics configuration for details.

config.name: topK
config.description:
The number of neighbors to find for each node.
The K-nearest neighbors are returned.
This value cannot be lower than 1.

Sample rate to limit the number of comparisons per node.
Value must be between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive).

Value as a percentage to determine when to stop early.
If fewer updates than the configured value happen, the algorithm stops.
Value must be between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive).

config.description: The method used to sample the first k random neighbors for each node. "uniform" and "randomWalk", both case-insensitive, are valid inputs.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description:
The seed value to control the randomness of the algorithm.
Note that concurrency must be set to 1 when setting this parameter.

config.description: Filter out from the list of K-nearest neighbors nodes with similarity below this threshold.

config.name: perturbationRate

The source node filter to apply.
Accepts a single node id,

or a single label.

config.name: seedTargetNodes
config.description: Enable seeding of target nodes.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The Neo4j source node or node id.

config.name: delta
config.description: The bucket width for grouping nodes with the same tentative distance to the source node.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The Neo4j source node or node id.

config.name: targetNode
config.description: The Neo4j target node or node id.

config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The Neo4j source node or node id.

config.name: targetNode
config.description: The Neo4j target node or node id.

config.name: latitudeProperty
config.description: The node property that stores the latitude value.

config.name: longitudeProperty
config.description: The node property that stores the longitude value.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The Neo4j source node or node id.

config.name: targetNode
config.description: The Neo4j target node or node id.

config.name: k
config.description: The number of shortest paths to compute between source and target node.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The starting source node ID.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: objective
config.description: If specified, the parameter dictates whether to find the minimum or the maximum weight spanning tree. By default, a minimum weight spanning tree is returned. Permitted values are 'minimum' and 'maximum'.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The starting source node ID.

config.name: targetNodes
config.description: The list of target nodes

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: delta
config.description: The bucket width for grouping nodes with the same tentative distance to the source node. Look into the Delta-Stepping documentation for more information.

config.name: applyRerouting
config.description: If specified, the algorithm will try to improve the outcome via an additional post-processing heuristic.

config.name: sourceNodes
config.description: The list of nodes from which to do a random walk.

config.name: walkLength
config.description: The number of steps in a single random walk.

config.name: walksPerNode
config.description: The number of random walks generated for each node.

config.name: inOutFactor
config.description: Tendency of the random walk to stay close to the start node or fan out in the graph. Higher value means stay local.

config.name: returnFactor
config.description: Tendency of the random walk to return to the last visited node. A value below 1.0 means a higher tendency.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights to influence the probabilities of the random walks. The weights need to be >= 0. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description: Seed value for the random number generator used to generate the random walks.

config.name: walkBufferSize
config.description: The number of random walks to complete before starting training.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The node id of the node where to start the traversal.

config.name: targetNodes
config.description: Ids for target nodes. Traversal terminates when any target node is visited.

config.name: maxDepth
config.description: The maximum distance from the source node at which nodes are visited.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The node id of the node where to start the traversal.

config.name: targetNodes
config.description: Ids for target nodes. Traversal terminates when any target node is visited.

config.name: maxDepth
config.description: The maximum distance from the source node at which nodes are visited.

config.name: sourceNode
config.description: The Neo4j source node or node id.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: computeMaxDistanceFromSource
config.description: Whether to enable computation of the maximal distance from source

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

algorithms.name: Fast Random Projection

config.name: propertyRatio
config.description: The desired ratio of the property embedding dimension to the total `embeddingDimension`. A positive value requires `featureProperties` to be non-empty.

config.name: featureProperties
config.description: The names of the node properties that should be used as input features. All property names must exist in the projected graph and be of type Float or List of Float.

config.name: embeddingDimension
config.description: The dimension of the computed node embeddings. Minimum value is 1.

config.name: iterationWeights
config.description: Contains a weight for each iteration. The weight controls how much the intermediate embedding from the iteration contributes to the final embedding.

config.name: nodeSelfInfluence
config.description: Controls for each node how much its initial random vector contributes to its final embedding.

config.name: normalizationStrength
config.description: The initial random vector for each node is scaled by its degree to the power of `normalizationStrength`.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description: A random seed which is used for all randomness in computing the embeddings.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use for weighted random projection. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config_notes: The number of iterations is equal to the length of `iterationWeights`.
It is required that `iterationWeights` is non-empty or `nodeSelfInfluence` is non-zero.

config.name: batchSize
config.description: The number of nodes per batch.

config.name: walkLength
config.description: The number of steps in a single random walk.

config.name: walksPerNode
config.description: The number of random walks generated for each node.

config.name: inOutFactor
config.description: Tendency of the random walk to stay close to the start node or fan out in the graph. Higher value means stay local.

config.name: returnFactor
config.description: Tendency of the random walk to return to the last visited node. A value below 1.0 means a higher tendency.

config.name: relationshipWeightProperty
config.description: Name of the relationship property to use as weights to influence the probabilities of the random walks. The weights need to be >= 0. If unspecified, the algorithm runs unweighted.

config.name: windowSize
config.description: Size of the context window when training the neural network.

config.name: negativeSamplingRate
config.description: Number of negative samples to produce for each positive sample.

config.name: positiveSamplingFactor
config.description: Factor for influencing the distribution for positive samples. A higher value increases the probability that frequent nodes are down-sampled.

config.name: negativeSamplingExponent
config.description: Exponent applied to the node frequency to obtain the negative sampling distribution. A value of 1.0 samples proportionally to the frequency. A value of 0.0 samples each node equally.

config.name: embeddingDimension
config.description: Size of the computed node embeddings.

config.name: embeddingInitializer
config.description: Method to initialize embeddings. Values are sampled uniformly from a range `[-a, a]`. With `NORMALIZED`, `a=0.5/embeddingDimension` and with `UNIFORM` instead `a=1`.

config.name: iterations
config.description: Number of training iterations.

config.name: initialLearningRate
config.description: Learning rate used initially for training the neural network. The learning rate decreases after each training iteration.

config.name: minLearningRate
config.description: Lower bound for learning rate as it is decreased during training.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description: Seed value used to generate the random walks, which are used as the training set of the neural network. Note, that the generated embeddings are still nondeterministic.

config.name: walkBufferSize
config.description: The number of random walks to complete before starting training.

config.name: featureProperties
config.description: The names of the node properties that should be used as input features. All property names must exist in the projected graph and be of type Float or List of Float.

config.name: iterations
config.description: The number of iterations to run HashGNN. Must be at least 1.

config.name: embeddingDensity
config.description: The number of features to sample per node in each iteration. Called `K` in the original paper. Must be at least 1.

config.name: heterogeneous
config.description: Whether different relationship types should be treated differently.

config.name: neighborInfluence
config.description: Controls how often neighbors' features are sampled in each iteration relative to sampling the node's own features. Must be non-negative.

config.name: binarizeFeatures
config.description: A map with keys `dimension` and `threshold`. If given, features are transformed into `dimension` binary features via hyperplane rounding. Increasing `threshold` makes the output more sparse, and it defaults to `0`. The value of `dimension` must be at least 1.

config.name: generateFeatures
config.description: A map with keys `dimension` and `densityLevel`. Should be given if and only if `featureProperties` is empty. If given, `dimension` binary features are generated with approximately `densityLevel` active features per node. Both must be at least 1 and `densityLevel` at most `dimension`.

config.name: outputDimension
config.description: If given, the embeddings are projected randomly into `outputDimension` dense features. Must be at least 1.

config.name: randomSeed
config.description: A random seed which is used for all randomness in computing the embeddings.
